titles.title: 3D Reference Organ for Brain, Male v1.2

descriptions.description: [This reference organ](https://hubmapconsortium.github.io/ccf/pages/ccf-3d-reference-library.html) was created using data from the "[Allen Human Reference Atlas – 3D, 2020](https://doi.org/10.1002/cne.24080)" representing one half of the human brain (Ding et al., 2016). The 141 anatomical structures were mirrored to arrive at a whole human brain (as intended) and resized to fit the Visible Human Male and Female bodies. Note that this organ is not licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0). Instead, these terms of use apply: [Allen Institute Terms of Use](https://alleninstitute.org/legal/terms-use).

alternateIdentifiers.alternateIdentifier: Kristen Browne; Heidi Schlehlein. 2022. 3D Reference Organ for Brain, Male v1.2. https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM946.SSFX.636. Accessed on May 6, 2022.

Kristen Browne, Heidi Schlehlein, Bruce W. Herr II, Ellen Quardokus, Andreas Bueckle, Katy Börner. 2022. [*HuBMAP CCF 3D Reference Object Library*.](https://hubmapconsortium.github.io/ccf/pages/ccf-3d-reference-library.html) Accessed on May 6, 2022.
